response: When I tried using the Kinect I found that it picked up hand motions only causing confusion.  I'm sure it works better for some and I was looking forward to never having to take my hands off the guitar but it didn't work out for me.

context: Does this keyboard response with Windows 8.1?
response: I had no issues with it on Windows 8!

context: do you ship this item in its original box?
response: Mine did arrive in the original box

context: Can you do 2 players on this console? And How?
response: I researched this thourgly before my purchase. This mini is supposed to do all things wii does except get online and play dvds. Mine under tree so caannot tell you for sure, sorry

context: Is Ultimate Warrior on this game, and can you play as him? I've read contradictory-sounding things...
response: Yes he is on the game & we can play as him, but he is hard to get you have to complete a task on 30 years of Wrestlemania & it is not easy.

context: Can you play multiplayer (2 people) with 2 Wii U Pro Controllers?
response: Yes, there is a free update which permits it.

context: I know it's compatible for Windows, but does it also work for Macbook Pros?
response: Yes, in fact I myself have used it on my Macbook. I used this guide to set it up: http://www.maclife.com/article/howtos/how_use_xbox_360_wireless_controller_your_macHappy Gaming :)

context: Does the scroll wheel have left,right and middle click on the scroll wheel ? I really like this feature
response: the mouse wheel clicks but only down not left and right.

context: Dose it work with PS4 Thanks
response: Hi, I do not have a PS4 but from what I've read on the internet there are compatibility issues of PS3 remote with the PS4, so this may not work on PS4. You could email the manufacturer at -pcsupport@smkusa.com - to get a specific reply. Hope this helps.

context: Will this headset work on the xbox 360 & the xbox one?  Looking for a headset that will work on both.
response: Yes but you need to buy an adapter for Xbox 1

context: Wife tried Nostromo and her small hand felt slightly strained to hold  in the WASD position. Is this better for smaller hands?
response: This has an extra row so with smaller hands I'd imagine it would be harder to reach the extra row.  It would probably be slightly better to hold in the WASD position due to the adjustable palm rest and the slider all the way closed if she doesn't care to use the extra row.

context: Does it work on Mac? Is there a version of Zoo Tycoon that works on Mac?
response: Being a PC user and not Mac, I couldn't tell you.  I hope someone else can; sorry.

context: Does this board still have the LED Issues? (Them dying off after a month or two)
response: Yes, mine started going bad within hours of hook up.

context: How do you get the controller skin?
response: It was a pre-order offer from Amazon. But, you can purchase one from skinit.com.

context: what kind of batteries do I need for this charging base?
response: It plug into an ac outlet.

context: Sorry you put only "500GB PS3 System" this is the super slim Playstation?
response: Yes, i recieved the slim unit

context: $ 7.99 is the price for each extension? or for the package of four extensions? Please clarify
response: All four come together

context: Has anyone used a xbox slim when in a car? Will the disk get messed up?
response: Yes, the Xbox wasn't designed with mobility in mind. unless you set up a custom suspension for everything the disk will get scratched hitting a bump on the road this happened to me.

context: is it in english
response: yes.  it is the US edition

context: will this case fit the dsi xl?
response: It fits the 3DS XL, so it should fit the DSi XL

context: Are these very comfortable?
response: Super comfortable. I wear them for hours, a fact that I'm not proud of.

context: Will this fit XL size?
response: No.  It is a very specific fit & not stretchy or anything.  It is definitely a case for protection.  And it has been awesome on my son's 3ds. But this model only fits the regular 3ds.  Maybe there's another model size?  If so I strongly recommend it.

context: I have an old Vista will this game work on my computer???? My son wants to play it.
response: I believe so. The only real issue with Vista is that it doesn't have anti-virus updates any longer. I liked it much better than the Windows 8 I have now. My son loves this game, so I'm sure yours will too.

context: Does anyone know if this version will work with Windows 8?
response: Yes, it does. Some minor problems that I cannot fix are it plays on full screen (so horizontally enlarged) and a bit blur screen probably due to the 32/64 bit difference (not sure tho).

context: Anything inappropriate for a 10yr old?
response: I would rate it PG-13 due to the few curse words and the costumes of such characters as Catwoman and Poison Ivy. But then again my 6 and 3 y/olds girls love watching me play it and the 6 y/o plays it on easy difficulty.

context: Does the sounds on the headset leak? if i were to play loud music on these, would other people around me hear the music as well?
response: No my gf sleeps right next to me wile I play all my games, this headset does not leak at all from my gf standpoint and I have it very loud sometimes.

context: If I already have Skyrim and just wanted to add the expansions, would I be able to continue with my game if I got this or have to start over?
response: You would absolutely be able to continue! The DLC comes on the disk and all you do is install it onto your system, it will go right along with your saves.

context: does the mic work good
response: Mic sounds great and no one online has complained about my mic. can hear everyone else great too.

context: Does the console include a way to charge the controllers or do you need to buy that seperately?
response: It has one controller with charge cable.

context: Work in win7 64bits?
response: Yes and no.  After I wrote my initial review on the Sidewinder, it worked great for about a week.  Afterwards, it was hit or miss as to when it would work.  I finally gave up and got this instead:  Thrustmaster T-Flight Hotas X Flight StickNo problems since!

context: Will the keys activate on steam?
response: No, these particular versions are drm locked to Uplay.

context: Will this game work with Korean xbox?
response: No, it will not, different formatted disk.

context: Is this program compatible with Windows Vista?
response: Yes as I have used it with Windows NT4.0/Xp/Vista/and Windows 7.I have a Sidewinder II,and it works with all programs as such as it is supposed to.

context: Does this product have a warranty
response: Yes it does, I think it's a one year warranty, I made use of it because my original shipped with a broken cord.

context: Can you set the keyboard backlighting to change based on what program or game you are running?
response: I have one, but have seen no way to do it myself.  But at least it doesn't take much reach to hit switches I, II and III.    :)

context: Is this ok for a 13 year old?  I'm not too concerned with blood or fighting...mostly wondering about language or nudity/sexual content
response: It would be fine. I don't remember too much of any of that stuff. Language is not bad at all. And nothing really sexual to it at all.
